Green lands0213089fjv63fm94ra2s2bp01t4ppwujt87t41209022014-03-29T12:11:15ZGreater good3347453/* See also */{{Quote|We'll spread our dominion across the Green lands, securing [[the Neck]] and everything above.|[[Balon Greyjoy]]|What is Dead May Never Die}}

'''Green lands''' is a term employed by the [[ironborn]] to refer to the mainland of [[Westeros]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, the term gives an insight on how the ironborn view the mainland of Westeros: fertile fields with soft, weak people, unlike the Iron Islands, which have harsh, poor land that has bred hardy and fierce men.
